entries.sourceEnglish: Standard
EPISODE NINE
THE MACHINES
Press X to Begin
Standard
Donkeys
Equines
Mammals
Animals
Animate Beings
Somethings
Inanimate Objects
Tools
Machines
Computers
Robots
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: I did it... I really did it!
All our work paid off—the Ass Soul Transfer was successful!
I can finally go to Mecha City!
Uncle Bad Ass?
Don't call me Bad Ass, my name is Cole.
I've finally shed that ridiculous donkey form!
Uncle Bad—Cole... is being a donkey such a terrible thing?
Kid, there's no good reason to be a 'donkey' or a 'Human' or whatever.
It's all about what's on the inside and what you aspire to do in this world.
But.
If you have a restless soul that wants to be taken seriously and change this world...
Then, given the historical prejudice against donkeys, being a donkey is...
Not fun.
The System is rigged against donkeys, among others.
Thanks for all your help kid.
Are you going to Mecha City now...?
I'll come back to visit.
Don't worry, I'll come back to visit.
I'll never forget you.
You were a great Assistant. I'll never forget you.
But I want to see Mecha City too! We can go together!
Kid, the world out there isn't safe for donkeys. You know that.
Then... can I become a Machine too?
We can play games during our breaks.
We can play games during our breaks.
We can invent new Machines!
We can invent new Machines!
We can make the world a better place for Asses!
We can make the world a better place for Asses!
I suppose you could use the prototype...
REALLY?! WAHOO!
I'll run the initializer. Give me a minute.
{$NewName}?
Comrade Mother?!
What are all these Machines??
Fuck. Of all the times—
AHH! That one can talk?!
I thought you were playing ROCKS with your UNCLE!
Don't worry Comrade Mother, this IS Uncle Bad—Cole.
By the Gods, don't be ridiculous!
Your Uncle Bad is an Ass, not an evil, soul-less, child-killing Machine.
Step away from those monstrosities this instant!
No! I'm going to become a Machine like Uncle Bad—Cole!
Become a Machine? Absolutely NOT!
And why do you keep calling that thing Cole?!
Because that's WHO HE IS.
Mother, listen to me.
I'm tired of you always looking over my shoulder and telling me what to do!
Uncle Bad—Cole has taught me the truth of how the world works.
That it's NOT FUN for Asses!
Give me one good reason why a Foal like me should want to grow up to be an Ass in this world?
Because it's what YOU ARE!
No, it's just how I was BORN.
Let's do it, Uncle Bad—Cole!
Don't you dare ignore me!
Let me go!!
Stop {$NewName} from entering the Machine.
Hit it!!
NO!! {$NewName}!!
Sturdy. Stop.
Do not try to break the Machine.
Interrupting the process would sever the bridge and destroy her Soul.
This can't be real.
I-I must be dreaming.
...Soulless Machines can't talk.
You're not dreaming. I am a Machine and I do have a Soul.
I'm Cole Butte.
Impossible.
What I'm about to tell you will sound impossible—sometimes I don't even believe it myself.
But every word of it is true.
Everybody thought I died in the cave-in along with Lazy.
When in reality, the Gods transformed me into a donkey.
As Lazy died, she tried to sing the Song of Ascension for herself.
But instead of her Soul going to the Astral Plane, mine did.
My Human Soul wasn't allowed in.
It was rejected and returned to this world.
I did try to save Lazy, but her injuries were too severe.
Look Sturdy.
All my life, I've been forced to be someone I didn't want to be. Do things I didn't want to do.
But I'm done.
So, I'm making my own decisions now.
And you should let the kid make her own decisions too.
Did you ever tell {$NewName} about us?
COOOOOOOOL!
I... can't look.

entries.context: The sound of the Gods is heard
entries.sourceEnglish: What's that sound—?
{s}{s=20}Are. You. Fucking. Kidding. Me.{/s}
WHY CAN'T THIS FUCKING MINE STOP CAVING IN?!
EVERYBODY GET OUT OF HERE, NOW!
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: Comrade Mother!
Don't touch me!
AHHH! GET ME OUT OF HERE!!!

entries.context: They are in the Elevator pulling on the cables to ascend up the shaft.
entries.sourceEnglish: Pull the cables!
AHH!!

entries.context: The lift falls and Bad and Foal are suspended by pushing their feet against the walls. Sturdy is standing on their shoulders. They hold the cable still.
entries.sourceEnglish: Kid, the cable is about to snap—let's go back-to-back!
One step at a time!
Everyone together—JUMP!
AHHH!
Comrade Mother!
Get away!
I'm not going to let you go!
Let's go, let's go, let's go!
Mother?
I've been saved... by a Machine...
An evil...
soulless...
job-taking...
child-killing Machine...
I'm not evil! I'm your daughter!
Daughter? I've lost both my daughters now...
I have nothing left.
Mother! LOOK AT ME!
How could you do this to me, your Mother?
I loved you...
How could you give up on our kind?
I'm not giving up. I'm growing up.
I'm not like the others in the Herd.
I've never wanted the work-filled life you had before Machines.
I don't like manual labour.
And I don't like sitting in a field doing nothing all day either.
I think everyone would be happier if we had a little fun together.
Mother?
WHAT THE FUCK IS TAKING SO LONG?
I can't hold this ceiling up much longer!
The Gods have foresaken me.
Go.
I'm not giving up and I'm not letting you stay here either!
Standard

entries.context: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consecteturew adipiscing elit. Nulla id sapien ut metus duba dapibus auctor. Nunc blandit in fermentumm

entries.sourceEnglish: What the fuck happened...?
Hey! What's that?
*COUGH*
Aunty Sick?!
What the fuck...?
SILENCE VASSALS!
WE ARE THE GODS OF CHANGE.
You fuckers turned me into a donkey!
WE ARE ALL POWERFUL!
Coooool!
My name is {$NewName} and I used to be a Foal!
This is my Uncle. He's a Machine too!
But he used to be a Human.
But also an Ass.
And that's my Mother, she's just an Ass.
SILENCE.
We are speaking to you from the Astral Plane through the Vassal formerly known as Sick Ass.
*COUGH*
We are conducting a search for a suitable Prophet.
What's a Prophet?
A Prophet spreads our holy message far and wide.
A Prophet spreads our holy message far and wide.
That sounds FUN! Doesn't it Uncle Bad—Cole?
No.
What's the message?
That a world in which Humans no longer have control over other living beings is coming.
That a world in which Humans no longer have control over other living beings is coming.
That the time to rise up against Humans and end their rule is nigh.
That the time to rise up against Humans and end their rule is nigh.
A Prophet rides upon our back and converts enemies to allies everywhere we go.
They ride upon our back and convert enemies into allies everywhere we go.
Allies! Allies are like friends, right Uncle Bad—Cole?
No.
What are we going to do with all those friends?
We shall build a world in which Humans no longer have control over other living beings.
We shall build a world in which Humans no longer have control over other living beings.
We shall rise up against Humans and end their rule.
We shall rise up against Humans and end their rule.
We shall now depart to find our next Human Proph—
Wait...

entries.context: This takes place inside the mind of the Gods.
entries.sourceEnglish: Haw, are you thinking what I'm thinking?
Yes, it would be a very different version of Operation Prophet.
Either way, it would be wonderfully different.
We have changed our minds.

entries.context: Ending of the part that takes place inside the mind of the Gods.
entries.sourceEnglish: One of you two Machines shall become our Prophet.

entries.context: False dialogue option. // Should this be Cole-Machine?
entries.sourceEnglish: Cole-Machine
{$NewName}
Gods.
You can't let a Machine become a Prophet!
There must be some other way to stop the Humans without using Machines.
If not... we'll be no better than the Humans ourselves.
That is not for us Gods to decide, but rather for each and every user of a Machine.
That is not for us Gods to decide, but rather for each and every user of a Machine.
We see no future in Absolutes.
We see no future in Absolutes.
A true Vassal must be able to carry the weight of History and Progress together.
We shall now pick our Prophet:
But which one?
The one full of enthusiasm yet lacking experience in the ways of the world?
Or the one with higher intelligence and more experience yet lacking in social graces?
Cole-Machine
Cole Butte, you shall be the next Prophet.
You shall join the ranks of great leaders from across time immemorial.
No thanks.
I don't believe in leaders.
And I don't want anything to do with you fuckers after what you did to me.
As the Prophet you shall go down in History as the first Prophet-Machine.
As the Prophet you shall go down in History as the first Prophet-Machine.
Don't care.
You shall be imbued with the Power to promote a radical new vision of the world.
You shall be imbued with the Power to promote a radical new vision of the world.
I already have a radical vision of the world.
Uncle Bad—Cole, wait!
You said we are going to transform the world into a better place for everyone!
Doesn't that include Asses?
What about Comrade Mother?
Cole Butte.
You know in your Soul that a philosophical transformation is necessary now more than ever.
You know in your Soul that a philosophical transformation is necessary now more than ever.
You are living proof that Humans have the ability to change.
You are living proof that Humans have the ability to transcend their station.
Can the first stop be Mecha City?
If you wish.
And at no point is this process going to turn me into a donkey again, is it?
No.
Fine. I'll be your Prophet.
Excellent. Climb onto our back and let us fly on the Winds of Revolution!
Let us depart, Prophet.
Wait!
Aunty Sick—Golden—Gods, can I fly on the Winds of Revolution, too?
*COUGH COUGH*
No.
But I'm his Assistant—
Hey kid. This isn't goodbye.
I'll see you in Mecha City.
Okay but—
Don't abandon your Mother.

entries.context: Cole flies off on the Golden Ass
entries.sourceEnglish: She won't say it, but she needs you.
Comrade Mother.
Where's the rest of the Herd?
The traitors were in trouble in the City.
So your Aunties and Uncles left on the Tractor-Machine to find them.
Mother, if Uncle Hard and the others are gone, I don't think it's safe for us here anymore.
Will you come with me to Mecha City?
{$NewName}
{$NewName}, you shall be the next Prophet.
You shall join the ranks of great leaders from across time immemorial.
WAHOO! Really?! Oh wow! That's so exciting!
Get on our back for we have much work to do.
Get on our back for we have much work to do.
Climb upon us and let us fly on the Winds of Revolution!
Climb upon us and let us fly on the Winds of Revolution!
Okay!
Wait... Aunty Sick—Golden—Gods, is this a short trip... or a long trip?
Your commitment to the cause shall be Eternal.
Your commitment to the cause shall be Eternal.
As long as it takes until all life is freed from under the yoke of Human tyranny.
As long as it takes until all life is freed from under the yoke of Human tyranny.
Oh.

entries.context: Needs 3 lines after this: Can we go to Mecha City? // If you wish // Wahoo let's go
entries.sourceEnglish: Um.
Comrade Mother... ?
Aunty Sick—Golden—Gods, can Comrade Mother come with us?
She is not yet ready to support your Movement.
She is not yet ready to support your Movement.
Only the passing of time shall tell how she will contribute to the cause.
Only the passing of time shall tell how she will contribute to the cause.
Kid, you really want to be a Prophet for these fuckers?
Yes...?
Then go.
But Uncle Bad—Cole, we're supposed to go to the big city together!
I'll come find you in Mecha.
And I'll look after your Mother, too.
She'll be safe with me.
Comrade Mother, I'm not giving up on you.
So, don't give up on me either.
Let us depart, Prophet.
See you soon Uncle Bad—Cole!

entries.context: Foal flies off on the Golden Ass
entries.sourceEnglish: See you soon... Mother. I love you.
Where are the others?
They went to the City...
They left me behind.
Again.
Pull yourself together.
I'm going to Mecha City.
And you're coming with me.
Come on. It'll take a few days on foot.
